alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 18 at 3:34PM EST until December 18 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (11.1 to 11.7 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Gloucester to Newburyport. Wave action will likely cause some washover onto coastal roads around the time of high tide. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Gloucester Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 18/03 PM 11.5/12.0 2.0/ 2.5 1.8/ 2.2 14-15 Minor 19/04 AM 9.7/10.2 0.2/ 0.7 0.7/ 1.1 9-10 None 19/04 PM 9.5/10.0 0.0/ 0.5 0.2/ 0.7 8 None 20/05 AM 9.5/10.0 0.0/ 0.5 0.2/ 0.8 7 None 20/05 PM 9.8/10.3 0.2/ 0.8 0.8/ 1.3 6 None 21/06 AM 10.7/11.2 1.2/ 1.7 1.4/ 1.9 7-8 None Merrimack River near Newburyport MA MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 4.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 18/04 PM 10.9/11.4 1.4/ 1.9 2.0/ 2.5 12-13 Minor 19/04 AM 8.8/ 9.3 -0.8/-0.2 0.6/ 1.1 8-9 None 19/05 PM 8.8/ 9.3 -0.8/-0.2 0.2/ 0.8 6-7 None 20/05 AM 8.7/ 9.2 -0.9/-0.4 0.2/ 0.8 6 None 20/06 PM 9.1/ 9.6 -0.5/ 0.0 0.9/ 1.4 6 None 21/06 AM 10.0/10.5 0.5/ 1.0 1.4/ 1.9 6-7 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
